main event: A round, yellow, translucent object with a concave surface was observed in the sky over New York City, moving directly north at a constant altitude and speed of a conventional aircraft.
interesting points: The object was spinning and appeared to shutter or shock before disappearing from view.
The object was observed for 32 to 39 seconds.
There were numerous aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
The observers reported seeing aircraft after the sighting of the unidentified object.
The report concludes that the sighting was possibly an aircraft in the area, and not caused by a weather balloon or temperature inversion.
sighted object: a round, yellow, translucent object with a concave surface
